technology: There were no technical difficulties during the conversation.
cur_neg_affect: The participant expresses very little negative affect about the pandemic in the present, mostly focusing on the inconvenience of potential future shots.
past_neg_affect: The participant expresses some negative affect about the pandemic in the past, particularly regarding the disruption to school and the general unease of the situation.
communal_orientation: The participant engages in active listening, asks follow-up questions, and shares their own experiences to relate to the conversation partner, showing a moderate level of communal orientation.
engagement: The participant is actively engaged in the conversation, asking questions, sharing experiences, and responding thoughtfully to the conversation partner's comments.
defensiveness: The participant does not exhibit any defensiveness in justifying their beliefs or perspective.

booster_importance: The participant seems to believe boosters are not very important, as they only got one when required and don't feel the need for more.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrates a moderate amount of cognitive complexity by considering different perspectives on vaccines and boosters, and weighing the pros and cons of getting them.
general_notes: The participant seems generally agreeable and open to different viewpoints, but also somewhat passive in their approach to health decisions.
